#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define PI 3.14159265359
long long a[111111];
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int n,t,tn;
	int flag;
	while(cin>>n)
	{
		flag=1;
		tn=n;
		while(tn)
		{
			t=tn%10;
			if(t!=0&&n%t!=0)
				flag=0;
			tn/=10;
		}
		if(flag)
			cout<<"Valid"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"Invalid"<<endl;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
